description:
Unearth the mysteries of the past with the Ancient Hamster Set! Adorn your hamster in majestic robes, intricate headdresses, and symbols of ancient wisdom. Watch as your hamster transforms into a regal figure, ready to explore the secrets of civilizations long gone.

This DLC contains a ready set of new costumes, as well as separate items for your hamster to dress up with other available elements.
name: Hamster Playground - Ancient Skin Pack
